dimension: 1 3/8 x 3/4 x 1 3/8 in. (3.5 x 1.9 x 3.5 cm) (netsuke only)
title: Netsuke [peach with Jo and Uba playing go] and Kagamibuta [Okame]
description: metal disk with shallow carving of a portrait of a chubby-faced woman; disk fits into ivory holder; netsuke in the shape of a peach which opens to reveal two men playing go; all parts attached together with green cord
